dashboard

); case 'Books':return(

Books

); case 'interface':return(

Home interface

); case 'Team':return(

Team

); } } return(

  • setActive('dashboard')}> Dashboard

  • setActive('Books')}> Books

  • setActive('interface')}> Home interface

  • setActive('Team')}> Team

{main()}
) } export default Admin;
